anchor_text: Infrastructure & Application patching: Infrastructure supporting the service, and applications are patched upon availability as a part of routine maintenance and as a result of identified vulnerabilities and supplier supplied patches to help ensure that applications and infrastructure network and system components supporting the service are hardened against security threats.
target_text: The CSP shall ensure that the maintenance agreements for equipment used to host the cloud service make it possible to have security updates installed timely on this equipment

anchor_text: Infrastructure & Application patching: Infrastructure supporting the service, and applications are patched upon availability as a part of routine maintenance and as a result of identified vulnerabilities and supplier supplied patches to help ensure that applications and infrastructure network and system components supporting the service are hardened against security threats.
target_text: The CSP shall document, communicate and implement policies and procedures for acceptable use and safe handling of assets (reference to ISP-01)

anchor_text: Infrastructure & Application patching: Infrastructure supporting the service, and applications are patched upon availability as a part of routine maintenance and as a result of identified vulnerabilities and supplier supplied patches to help ensure that applications and infrastructure network and system components supporting the service are hardened against security threats.
target_text: The CSP shall automatically monitor the service components under its responsibility for compliance with hardening specifications

anchor_text: Infrastructure & Application patching: Infrastructure supporting the service, and applications are patched upon availability as a part of routine maintenance and as a result of identified vulnerabilities and supplier supplied patches to help ensure that applications and infrastructure network and system components supporting the service are hardened against security threats.
target_text: The CSP shall implement automated monitoring to identify vulnerabilities and deviations, which shall be automatically reported to the appropriate CSP’s subject matter experts for immediate assessment and action

anchor_text: Infrastructure & Application patching: Infrastructure supporting the service, and applications are patched upon availability as a part of routine maintenance and as a result of identified vulnerabilities and supplier supplied patches to help ensure that applications and infrastructure network and system components supporting the service are hardened against security threats.
target_text: The CSP shall assess the severity of identified vulnerabilities according to the criteria defined in OPS-17 and measures are taken to immediately eliminate or mitigate them.

anchor_text: Software & Firmware Updates: [The Organization] installs security-relevant software and firmware updates per [The Organization] policy; and incorporates flaw remediation into Systems configuration management process.
target_text: The procedures shall include the following activities, depending on the risk assessment:  Static Application Security Testing;  Dynamic Application Security Testing;  Code reviews by subject matter experts; and  Obtaining information about confirmed vulnerabilities in software libraries provided by third parties and used in their own cloud service.

anchor_text: Software & Firmware Updates: [The Organization] installs security-relevant software and firmware updates per [The Organization] policy; and incorporates flaw remediation into Systems configuration management process.
target_text: The CSP shall apply appropriate measures to check the cloud service for vulnerabilities that may have been integrated into the cloud service during the development process.

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The cloud service shall be accessible by cloud services from other CSPs or cloud customers’ IT systems through documented inbound and outbound interfaces

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall provide comprehensible and transparent information on:  Its jurisdiction; and  System component locations, including its subcontractors, where the cloud customer's data is processed, stored and backed up.

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP makes its list of dependencies available to customers upon request

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall implement sufficient partitioning measures between the information system providing the cloud service and its other information systems

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall include in cloud service contractual agreements, at least, the following aspects concerning the termination of the contractual relationship:  Type, scope and format of the data the CSP provides to the CSC;  Delivery methods of the data to the cloud customer;  Definition of the timeframe, within which the CSP makes the data available to the CSC;  Definition of the point in time as of which the CSP makes the data inaccessible to the CSC and deletes these; and  The CSC's responsibilities and obligations to cooperate for the provision of the data.

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall maintain a list of dependencies to hardware and software products used in the development of its cloud service

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall provide information about  The locations from administration and supervision may be carried out on the cloud service;  The locations to which any cloud customer data, meta-data or derived data may be transferred, processed or stored.

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The documentation shall cover, at least, how the subnets are allocated, how the network is zoned and segmented, how it connects with third-party and public networks, and the geographical locations in which the cloud customers' data are stored

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The interfaces shall be clearly documented for subject matter experts to understand how they can be used to retrieve the data

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall implement suitable measures for partitioning between the CSCs

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: In liaison with the inventory of assets (cf. AM-01), the documentation shall include the equipment that provides security functions and the servers that host the data or provide sensitive functions.

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall maintain up-to-date all documentation of the logical structure of the network used to provision or operate the cloud service

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: All CSP commitments regarding locations of data processing and storage shall be enforced by the cloud service architecture

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: The CSP shall document the locations from which it conducts support operations for clients, and it shall document the list of operations that can be carried by client support in each location December 2020

anchor_text: System Description & Boundaries: [The Organization] has prepared a description of the system and its boundaries and has provided this description to internal and external authorized users.
target_text: Communication on these interfaces shall use standardised communication protocols that ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the transmitted information according to its protection requirements

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The CSP shall document the implemented measures after a security incident has been processed and, following the contractual agreements, the document shall be sent to the affected customers for final acknowledgment or, if applicable, as confirmation.

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: Communication on these interfaces shall use standardised communication protocols that ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the transmitted information according to its protection requirements

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The CSP shall continuously report on security incidents to affected customers until the security incident is closed and a solution is applied and documented, in accordance to the defined SLA and contractual agreements

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The CSP shall inform employees and external business partners of their contractual obligations to report all security events that become known to them and are directly related to the cloud service

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The directory shall contain the following information:  Company name;  Address;  Locations of data processing and storage;  Responsible contact person at the service provider/supplier;  Responsible contact person at the cloud service provider; Description of the service;  Classification based on the risk assessment;  Beginning of service usage; and  Proof of compliance with contractually agreed requirements.

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The CSP shall inform the customers affected by security incidents in a timely and appropriate manner

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: Communication over untrusted networks shall be encrypted according to CKM-02

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The CSP shall maintain contacts with the competent authorities in terms of information security and relevant technical groups to stay informed about current threats and vulnerabilities

anchor_text: External Communication Requirements: [The Organization] defines external communication requirements for incidents, including: • information about external party dependencies • criteria for notification to external parties as required by [The Organization] policy in the event of a security breach • contact information for authorities (e.g., law enforcement, regulatory bodies, etc.)
target_text: The CSP shall make information on security incidents or confirmed security breaches available to all affected customers

anchor_text: Access Notification: [The Organization] informs its cloud service customers within 72 hrs. whenever Systems internal or external staff read or write to cloud customers' data during processing, storage or transmission. The information regarding the access is sufficiently detailed to enable the client to assess the risks of the access.
target_text: The CSP shall timely inform a CSC whenever internal or external employees of the CSP access in a non-encrypted form to the CSC's data processed, stored or transmitted in the cloud service without the prior consent of the CSC, including at least:  Cause, time, duration, type and scope of the access;  Enough details to enable subject matters experts of the CSC to assess the risks of the access.

anchor_text: Access Notification: [The Organization] informs its cloud service customers within 72 hrs. whenever Systems internal or external staff read or write to cloud customers' data during processing, storage or transmission. The information regarding the access is sufficiently detailed to enable the client to assess the risks of the access.
target_text: The CSP shall require prior consent from a CSC before any access in a non-encrypted form to the CSC's data processed, stored or transmitted in the cloud service, providing meaningful information as defined in IAM-09.5.

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: The CSP shall only provide access to or disclose cloud customer data in the context of government investigation requests after the CSP’s legal assessment (cf. INQ-01) has shown that an applicable and valid legal basis exists and that the investigation request must be granted on that basis.

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: The CSP shall automatically monitor the accesses performed by or on behalf of investigators to ensure that they correspond to the determined legal basis December 2020

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: The legal assessment shall determine whether the government agency has an applicable and legally valid basis and what further steps need to be taken

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: When no clear limitation of the data is possible, the CSP shall anonymise or pseudonymise the data so that government agencies can only assign it to those cloud customers who are subject of the investigation request

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: The CSP shall subject investigation requests from government agencies to a legal assessment by subject matter experts

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: The CSP shall document and implement procedures to ensure that government agencies only have access to the data they need to investigate

anchor_text: Legal Assessments: Investigation requests from government agencies are subjected to legal assessments by subject matter experts to determine if the requests have applicable and legal basis, and if [The Organization] is required to comply with the requests.
target_text: In the context of an investigation of an incident concerning a CSC, the CSP shall have the ability to provide to the CSC the logs related to its cloud service

anchor_text: Trusted Connections: All trusted connections are documented and approved by authorized personnel; management ensures the following documentation is in place prior to approval: • agreement with supplier • security requirements • nature of transmitted information
target_text: The business continuity plan and contingency plans shall cover at least the following aspects:  Defined purpose and scope, including relevant business processes and dependencies;  Accessibility and comprehensibility of the plans for persons who are to act accordingly;  Ownership by at least one designated person responsible for review, updating and approval;  Defined communication channels, roles and responsibilities including notification of the customer;  Recovery procedures, manual interim solutions and reference information (taking into account prioritisation in the recovery of cloud infrastructure components and services and alignment with customers);  Methods for putting the plans into effect;  Continuous process improvement; and  Interfaces to Security Incident Management.

anchor_text: Trusted Connections: All trusted connections are documented and approved by authorized personnel; management ensures the following documentation is in place prior to approval: • agreement with supplier • security requirements • nature of transmitted information
target_text: The CSP shall distinguish between trusted and untrusted networks, based on a risk assessment

anchor_text: Trusted Connections: All trusted connections are documented and approved by authorized personnel; management ensures the following documentation is in place prior to approval: • agreement with supplier • security requirements • nature of transmitted information
target_text: The requirements on which the agreements are based shall be documented and reviewed at regular intervals, at least annually; if the review shows that the requirements need to be adapted, the non-disclosure or confidentiality agreements shall be updated accordingly.

anchor_text: Cloud Service Legal Jurisdictions: The cloud service provider informs the cloud service customer of the legal jurisdictions governing the cloud service.
target_text: The CSP shall include in the description provided for each CCC a list of actionable

anchor_text: Cloud Service Legal Jurisdictions: The cloud service provider informs the cloud service customer of the legal jurisdictions governing the cloud service.
target_text: The CSP shall provide information about  The locations from administration and supervision may be carried out on the cloud service;  The locations to which any cloud customer data, meta-data or derived data may be transferred, processed or stored.

anchor_text: Cloud Service Legal Jurisdictions: The cloud service provider informs the cloud service customer of the legal jurisdictions governing the cloud service.
target_text: The CSP shall only contract supporting external bodies that are qualified incident response service providers or government agencies

anchor_text: Cloud Service Legal Jurisdictions: The cloud service provider informs the cloud service customer of the legal jurisdictions governing the cloud service.
target_text: If the CSP expects CSCs to certify with EUCS their own services based on its cloud service using composition, it shall provide specific documentation for them, based on the Complementary Customer Controls (CCCs) that they have defined

anchor_text: Cloud Service Legal Jurisdictions: The cloud service provider informs the cloud service customer of the legal jurisdictions governing the cloud service.
target_text: The CSP shall make the documentation defined in DOC-05.1 available to cloud customers upon request

anchor_text: Cloud Service Legal Jurisdictions: The cloud service provider informs the cloud service customer of the legal jurisdictions governing the cloud service.
target_text: The CSP shall inform the affected CSC(s) without undue delay, unless the applicable legal basis on which the government agency is based prohibits this or there are clear indications of illegal actions in connection with the use of the cloud service

anchor_text: Monitor of Installed Software: [The Organization] monitors all user installed software, and validates whether or not the software is appropriate. Any inappropriate software installed is immediately removed.
target_text: The CSP shall centrally manage the assets under the custody of internal and external employees, including at least software, data, and policy distribution, as well as remote deactivation, deletion or locking, as available on the asset.

anchor_text: Monitor of Installed Software: [The Organization] monitors all user installed software, and validates whether or not the software is appropriate. Any inappropriate software installed is immediately removed.
target_text: The information about assets shall be considered by monitoring applications to identify the impact on cloud services and functions in case of events that could lead to a breach of protection objectives, and to support information provided to affected cloud customers in accordance with contractual agreements

anchor_text: Monitor of Installed Software: [The Organization] monitors all user installed software, and validates whether or not the software is appropriate. Any inappropriate software installed is immediately removed.
target_text: The CSP shall document, communicate and implement policies and procedures according to ISP-02 to protect its systems and its customers from malware, covering at least the following aspects:  Use of system-specific protection mechanisms;  Operating protection programs on system components under the responsibility of the CSP that are used to provide the cloud service in the production environment; and  Operation of protection programs for employees' terminal equipment.

anchor_text: Monitor of Installed Software: [The Organization] monitors all user installed software, and validates whether or not the software is appropriate. Any inappropriate software installed is immediately removed.
target_text: The CSP shall document, communicate and implement policies and procedures for acceptable use and safe handling of assets (reference to ISP-01)

anchor_text: Restrict Use of Nonessential Functions and Services: [The Organization] identifies and restricts the use of nonessential functions, ports, protocols, and services.
target_text: The CSP shall implement technical safeguards to ensure that no unknown (physical or virtual) devices join its (physical or virtual) network

anchor_text: Restrict Use of Nonessential Functions and Services: [The Organization] identifies and restricts the use of nonessential functions, ports, protocols, and services.
target_text: The CSP shall review at specified intervals the business justification for using all services, protocols, and ports. This review shall also include the compensatory measures used for protocols that are considered insecure

anchor_text: Third-party Software Management: The CSP shall document and implement policies for the use of third-party and open source software The policy should cover the following aspects:  Restrictions on component age;  Restrictions on outdated and EOL/EOS components;  Restrictions on components with known vulnerabilities;  Restrictions on public repository usage;  Restrictions on acceptable licenses;  Component update requirements;  Deny list of prohibited components and versions; and  Acceptable community contribution guidelines.
target_text: The CSP shall document and implement policies for the use of third-party and open source software

anchor_text: EUCS Nonconformity Notification: [The Organization] notifies and informs customers who operate an EUCS-certified cloud service of any [The Organization] nonconformities related to EUCS requirements.
target_text: The CSP shall inform CSCs who operate an EUCS-certified cloud service of nonconformities

anchor_text: Security Organization Communication: The cloud service provider maintains regular contact with the Conformity Assessment Body (CAB) and National Cybersecurity Certification Authority (NCCA) to stay informed about current threats and vulnerabilities.
target_text: The CSP shall maintain regular contact with its CAB and NCCA to stay informed about current threats and vulnerabilities
